title: BRIEF-Cannabis Wheaton Updates On Initial Development Of FV Pharma Facility
text: 14 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Cannabis Wheaton Updates On Initial Development Of FV Pharma Facility Reuters Staff   Cannabis Wheaton Income Corp: * CANNABIS WHEATON INCOME CORP. PROVIDES UPDATE ON THE INITIAL DEVELOPMENT OF FV PHARMA INC. FACILITY * CANNABIS WHEATON INCOME - TO DEVELOP, FINANCE ALL ASPECTS OF FV PHARMA’S FACILITY IN MUTUALLY AGREED PHASES OF CONSTRUCTION, OPERATIONS, OTHER PHASES​ * CANNABIS WHEATON INCOME CORP - CO WILL RECEIVE 49.9% STREAM OF ALL CANNABIS PRODUCED AT FACILITY, UNDER DEAL WITH CANNABIS WHEATON, IN PERPETUITY​ * CANNABIS WHEATON INCOME - CO, FV PHARMA WORKING TO FINALIZE FUNDING, TIMING OF DEVELOPMENT OF PHASE I WHICH IS ESTIMATED TO COST ABOUT $35 MILLION Source text for Eikon:
